extendedInfo.description: Checkit allows users to report an issue to their community leader or manager in just three clicks.  1-User takes a picture2-types message (if needed)3-click sendThe manager or community leader will receive an email with a picture, address, description, and a map location of the issue. This app is useful for managers, maintenance, residents, and anyone interested in easily taking a picture with a mapped location.

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I am a property manager and i use this a lot to notify the maintenance guys when there is something that needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User
